00052     public function registerClientScripts( $bLocateScript = false )
00053     {
00054         //  Daddy...
00055         parent::registerClientScripts( $bLocateScript );
00056         
00057         //  Reset the baseUrl for our own scripts
00058         $this->baseUrl = $this->extLibUrl . self::PS_EXTERNAL_PATH;
00059         
00060         //  Meta data for goodness...
00061         $this->pushScriptFile( $this->extLibUrl . '/jquery-plugins/jquery.metadata.js', CClientScript::POS_HEAD );
00062         
00063         //  Register scripts necessary
00064         $this->pushScriptFile( ( $_SERVER['HTTPS'] == 'on' ? self::CDN_SSL_ROOT : self::CDN_ROOT ) . '/jquery.validate.min.js', CClientScript::POS_HEAD );
00065 //      $this->pushScriptFile( $this->baseUrl . '/jquery.validate.min.js', CClientScript::POS_HEAD );

00099     protected function generateJavascript( $sTargetSelector = null, $arOptions = null, $sInsertBeforeOptions = null )
00100     {
00101         //  Don't screw with div formatting...
00102         if ( ! empty( $arOptions ) && ! in_array( 'errorPlacement', $arOptions ) )
00103             $arOptions['errorPlacement'] = 'function(error,element){error.appendTo(element.parent("div"));}';
00104         else
00105         {
00106             if ( empty( $this->errorPlacement ) || ! $this->hasOption( 'errorPlacement' ) )
00107                 $this->addOption( 'errorPlacement', 'function(error,element){error.appendTo(element.parent("div"));}' );
00108         }
00109 
00110         //  Get the options...
00111         $_arOptions = ( null != $arOptions ) ? $arOptions : $this->makeOptions();
00112         $_sId = $this->getTargetSelector( $sTargetSelector );
00113         
00114         //  Jam something in front of options?
00115         if ( null != $sInsertBeforeOptions )
00116         {
00117             $_sOptions = $sInsertBeforeOptions;
00118             if ( ! empty( $_arOptions ) ) $_sOptions .= ", {$_arOptions}";
00119             $_arOptions = $_sOptions;
00120         }
00121 
00122         $_sValidate = '$.validator.addMethod( "phoneUS", function(phone_number, element) { phone_number = phone_number.replace(/\s+/g, ""); return this.optional(element) || phone_number.length > 9 && phone_number.match(/^(1[\s\.-]?)?(\([2-9]\d{2}\)|[2-9]\d{2})[\s\.-]?[2-9]\d{2}[\s\.-]?\d{4}$/);}, "Please specify a valid phone number");';
00123         $_sValidate .= '$.validator.addMethod( "postalcode", function(postalcode, element) { return this.optional(element) || postalcode.match(/(^\d{5}(-\d{4})?$)|(^[ABCEGHJKLMNPRSTVXYabceghjklmnpstvxy]{1}\d{1}[A-Za-z]{1} ?\d{1}[A-Za-z]{1}\d{1})$/);}, "Please specify a valid postal/zip code");';
00124         
00125         //  Put these via registerScript as not to double them up.
00126         PS::_rs( '#psValidate.validator.addMethod#', $_sValidate );
00127         
00128         $this->script =<<<CODE
00129 var _psValidator = $('{$_sId}').validate({$_arOptions});
00130 CODE;
00131 
00132         return $this->script;
00133     }
